name: Dilly Dally Dice - GMTK GameJam 2022 entry
name_original: Dilly Dally Dice - GMTK GameJam 2022 entry
description:
My entry for GMTK GameJam 2022

Controls:
Use WASD to roll dice around the board.
Use Q and E to rotate the equation spell around the board.
Use the MOUSE to move  the equation spell around the board.
Use LEFT CLICK to activate the equation spell.

Gameplay:
Make equation spells using the dice. Each spell will influence the current amount.

Match the current amount with the target amount to progress.

Using spells with a dice in the middle will turn them into bricks that can only be removed with the destroy spell.

Tools used:
Vanilla JavaScript for core game code (don't judge ;P).
THREE.js + GSAP graphics and animation.
Photoshop for pixel art.

All content made by me.
Built in 48 hours (did sleep 8 hours a day, I'm not used to all-nighters anymore haha).
